252    ...

[docs]
265    def __init__(
266        self,
267        base_url: str = "http://localhost:8080",
268        api_key: str | None = None,
269        timeout: float = 30.0,
270        http: _SupportsHttp | None = None,
271    ) -> None:
272        """Return init.
273
274        Parameters
275        ----------
276        base_url : str, optional
277            Description for ``base_url``.
278        api_key : str | None, optional
279            Description for ``api_key``.
280        timeout : float, optional
281            Description for ``timeout``.
282        http : _SupportsHttp | None, optional
283            Description for ``http``.
284        
285        Examples
286        --------
287        >>> from search_client.client import __init__
288        >>> __init__(..., ..., ..., ...)  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
289        
290        See Also
291        --------
292        search_client.client
293        
294        Notes
295        -----
296        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
297        """
298        


[docs]
299        self.base_url = base_url.rstrip("/")




[docs]
300        self.api_key = api_key




[docs]
301        self.timeout = timeout




[docs]
302        self._http: _SupportsHttp = http or requests

[docs]
304    def _headers(self) -> dict[str, str]:
305        """Return headers.
306
307        Returns
308        -------
309        Mapping[str, str]
310            Description of return value.
311        
312        Examples
313        --------
314        >>> from search_client.client import _headers
315        >>> result = _headers()
316        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
317        ...
318        
319        See Also
320        --------
321        search_client.client
322        
323        Notes
324        -----
325        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
326        """
327        
328        
329        h = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
330        if self.api_key:
331            h["Authorization"] = f"Bearer {self.api_key}"
332        return h


333


[docs]
334    def healthz(self) -> dict[str, Any]:
335        """Return healthz.
336
337        Returns
338        -------
339        Mapping[str, Any]
340            Description of return value.
341        
342        Examples
343        --------
344        >>> from search_client.client import healthz
345        >>> result = healthz()
346        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
347        ...
348        
349        See Also
350        --------
351        search_client.client
352        
353        Notes
354        -----
355        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
356        """
357        
358        
359        r = self._http.get(f"{self.base_url}/healthz", timeout=self.timeout)
360        r.raise_for_status()
361        return r.json()


362


[docs]
363    def search(
364        self,
365        query: str,
366        k: int = 10,
367        filters: dict[str, Any] | None = None,
368        explain: bool = False,
369    ) -> dict[str, Any]:
370        """Return search.
371
372        Parameters
373        ----------
374        query : str
375            Description for ``query``.
376        k : int, optional
377            Description for ``k``.
378        filters : Mapping[str, Any] | None, optional
379            Description for ``filters``.
380        explain : bool, optional
381            Description for ``explain``.
382        
383        Returns
384        -------
385        Mapping[str, Any]
386            Description of return value.
387        
388        Examples
389        --------
390        >>> from search_client.client import search
391        >>> result = search(..., ..., ..., ...)
392        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
393        ...
394        
395        See Also
396        --------
397        search_client.client
398        
399        Notes
400        -----
401        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
402        """
403        
404        
405        payload = {"query": query, "k": k, "filters": filters or {}, "explain": explain}
406        r = self._http.post(
407            f"{self.base_url}/search", json=payload, headers=self._headers(), timeout=self.timeout
408        )
409        r.raise_for_status()
410        return r.json()


411


[docs]
412    def concepts(self, q: str, limit: int = 50) -> dict[str, Any]:
413        """Return concepts.
414
415        Parameters
416        ----------
417        q : str
418            Description for ``q``.
419        limit : int, optional
420            Description for ``limit``.
421        
422        Returns
423        -------
424        Mapping[str, Any]
425            Description of return value.
426        
427        Examples
428        --------
429        >>> from search_client.client import concepts
430        >>> result = concepts(..., ...)
431        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
432        ...
433        
434        See Also
435        --------
436        search_client.client
437        
438        Notes
439        -----
440        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
441        """
442        
443        
444        r = self._http.post(
445            f"{self.base_url}/graph/concepts",
446            json={"q": q, "limit": limit},
447            headers=self._headers(),
448            timeout=self.timeout,
449        )
450        r.raise_for_status()
451        return r.json()
